mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (userSeq, title, content, recruiteCnt, recruiteMax, place, cost, ability, status, gender, shower, parking, beverage, rental, createdDate, matchstartDate, matchendDate) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{recruiteCnt} ,#{recruiteMax}, #{place}, #{cost}, #{ability}, #{status}, #{gender}, #{shower}, #{parking}, #{beverage}, #{rental}, #{createdDate}, #{matchstartDate}, #{matchendDate})
mapper.select: SELECT articleSeq, userSeq, title, content, viewCnt, recruiteCnt, recruiteMax, place, cost, ability, status, gender, shower, parking, beverage, rental, DATE_FORMAT(createdDate, "%Y:%m:%d %H:%i:%s") as createdDate, DATE_FORMAT(matchstartDate, "%Y:%m:%d %H:%i:%s") as matchstartDate, DATE_FORMAT(matchendDate, "%Y:%m:%d %H:%i:%s") as matchendDate FROM articles WHERE articleSeq = #{articleSeq} ORDER BY matchstartDate
